A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is no character relation between the calm jedi knight that destroyed the empire and the jedi master he was suposed to be. This movie makes it seem like the original triology was pointless. There is no empire defeat because the First Order rules. No rebellion win after the Endor battle\, because its down to one lonely cruiser. Luke is not a hero\, but a failure that runs away (seriously Luke Skywalker hides? Do we leave in the same planet\, did you watch any of the originals Rian\, this man sacrificed himself for the rebellion). Leia is the only character that retains her essence\, but now seems to have amazing jedi powers. Rya Johnson was a kid with a hatchet hacking away any sense of acomplishment by our old heroes. RIP Star Wars\, nice vissuals though.
